name: 10 Sugar Sweet - Czech Glass Rondelle Beads
description:
Czech glass rondelle beads are in an opaque white color, finished with a gorgeous fuchsia luster. The luster gives off a spotted, speckled finished with hints of gold throughout. 


Materials: Pressed, table cut, Czech glass
Quantity: 10
Size: 6x8mm
Hole Location: Runs vertically (from top to bottom) through the centre of the bead
Colour: Opaque white - Luster


Please note – All of my photos are taken with a SLR camera/micro lens. All beads may appear larger than they are real to life. Please use my measurements as a reference.

All photographs belong to ZoeAndBruno © 2008-2012
